verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H8085>"Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H779>"Cursed<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> does not <S%H8085>heed<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>

<S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your forefathers in the <S%H1>day<s%> that I <S%H3117>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H3318>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4714>iron<s%> <S%H1270>furnace,<s%> <S%H3564>saying,<s%> <S%H559>'Listen<s%> to My <S%H8085>voice,<s%> and <S%H6963>do<s%> according to <S%H6213>all<s%> <S%H3605>which<s%> I <S%H834>command<s%> you; so you shall be My <S%H6680>people,<s%> and I will be your <S%H5971>God,<s%>'

in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H6965>confirm<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your forefathers, to <S%H1>give<s%> them a <S%H5414>land<s%> <S%H776>flowing<s%> with <S%H2100>milk<s%> and <S%H2461>honey,<s%> as [it is] <S%H1706>this<s%> <S%H2088>day.<s%> "'"Then I <S%H3117>answered<s%> and <S%H6030>said,<s%> <S%H559>"Amen,<s%> O <S%H543>Lord.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7121>"Proclaim<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>'Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

'For I <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> <S%H5749>warned<s%> your fathers in the <S%H1>day<s%> that I <S%H3117>brought<s%> them up from the <S%H5927>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> even to <S%H4714>this<s%> <S%H2088>day,<s%> <S%H3117>warning<s%> <S%H5749>persistently,<s%> <S%H7925>saying,<s%> <S%H559>"Listen<s%> to My <S%H8085>voice.<s%>"

'Yet they did not <S%H8085>obey<s%> or <S%H5186>incline<s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but <S%H1980>walked,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one,<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> therefore I <S%H935>brought<s%> on them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> [them] to <S%H6213>do,<s%> but they <S%H6213>did<s%> not.' "

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "A <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> has been <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

"They have <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H7223>ancestors<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> My <S%H1697>words,<s%> and they have <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them; the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6565>broken<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3772>made<s%> with their fathers."

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> <S%H9567>disaster<s%> on them <S%H834>which<s%> they will not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3318>escape;<s%> though they will <S%H2199>cry<s%> to Me, yet I will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them.

"Then the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense,<s%> but they <S%H3467>surely<s%> will not <S%H3467>save<s%> them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H9567>disaster.<s%>

"For your <S%H430>gods<s%> are as <S%H4557>many<s%> as your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> O <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and as <S%H4557>many<s%> as the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> are the <S%H4196>altars<s%> you have <S%H7760>set<s%> up to the <S%H1322>shameful<s%> <S%H1322>thing,<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

"Therefore do not <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up a <S%H7440>cry<s%> or <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for them; for I will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H6256>when<s%> they <S%H7121>call<s%> to Me <S%H1157>because<s%> of their <S%H9567>disaster.<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> right has My <S%H3039>beloved<s%> in My <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> she has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4209>vile<s%> <S%H4209>deeds<s%>? Can the <S%H6944>sacrificial<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5674>take<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> from you your <S%H9567>disaster,<s%> <S%H227>So<s%> [that] you can <S%H5937>rejoice<s%>?"

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> "A <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>tree,<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> in <S%H6529>fruit<s%> and <S%H8389>form<s%>"; With the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1999>tumult<s%> He has <S%H3341>kindled<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on it, And its <S%H1808>branches<s%> are <S%H9570>worthless.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> who <S%H5193>planted<s%> you, has <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you <S%H1558>because<s%> of the <S%H9567>evil<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3707>provoke<s%> Me by <S%H6999>offering<s%> up <S%H6999>sacrifices<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>
Moreover, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3045>made<s%> it <S%H3045>known<s%> to me and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it; <S%H227>Then<s%> Thou didst <S%H7200>show<s%> me their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>

But I was like a <S%H9017>gentle<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H2986>led<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter;<s%> And I did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that they had <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H4284>plots<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, [saying,] "Let us <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> with its <S%H3899>fruit,<s%> And let us <S%H3772>cut<s%> him <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> That his <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>"

But, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> who <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> Who <S%H974>tries<s%> the <S%H3629>feelings<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Let me <S%H7200>see<s%> Thy <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them, For to Thee have I <S%H1540>committed<s%> my <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Do not <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that you might not <S%H4191>die<s%> at our <S%H3027>hand<s%>";

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H6485>punish<s%> them! The <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will <S%H4191>die<s%> by <S%H7458>famine;<s%>

and a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> will not be <S%H1961>left<s%> to them, for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H9567>disaster<s%> on the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> â€“ the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>punishment.<s%> "
